label: ConformityAssessment
comment: A specific assessment about the product or facility against a specific specification.  Eg the carbon intensity of a given product or batch.

datatypeProperties.comment: The UN ESG topic category for this assessment (eg vocabulary.uncefact.org/sustainability/emissions)
The specification against which the assessment is made.
An indicator of whether or not the assessment meets the specification.
The list of specific values measured as part of this assessment (eg tensile strength)
The reference to the standard or regulation that defines the specification / criteria
The list of facilities that are the subject of this conformity assessment.
The list of products that are the subject of this conformity assessment

referencedBy.comment: The list of specific assessments made within this conformity attestation.
